views.markdown:
• IGFormat – Because Instagram Should Work for You
  • Tired of Instagram’s nonsense? Ads everywhere, pointless restrictions, and features that feel half-baked? IGFormat fixes all of that.
  • Stop dealing with a clunky experience. IGFormat gives you full control, making Instagram smoother, smarter, and actually useful.
  • No more limitations. No more frustration. Just a better way to use Instagram, the way it should have been from the start.
  • Want more freedom, better privacy, and a cleaner app? IGFormat makes it happen—without asking for permission.
  • Instagram won’t improve itself, so we did it for them.
